title: Select
description: A component for selecting options from a dropdown.

basicUsage.title: Basic Usage
basicUsage.description: Select is a dropdown element that allows you to choose one option from multiple choices.

placeholder.title: Placeholder
placeholder.description: You can use a placeholder to indicate the unselected state.

icons.title: Icons
icons.description: You can add icons to select elements.

states.title: States
states.description: Select supports default, disabled, and multiple selection states.

scss.title: SCSS Styling
scss.description: You can apply select styles using podo-ui mixins.
